markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Spawn Of Kothogaz](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1731)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

[Kothogaz's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1730) presence causes the land to sprout festering hives. Insectile, acid-drooling spawn slither from these growths as lesser versions of their creator.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 27

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Spawn Of Kothogaz](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1731)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 53</row>

**Perception** +14

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 70

, regeneration [](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=26) 10 (deactivated by [good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83))

**Immunities**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, burrow 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +17 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d10+7 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
wing shard +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 piercing plus 1d6 sonic

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
putrid spit +17 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d8+4 acid

**Fusing Spit** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3)) The spawn retches up thick, caustic sludge and spits it at a creature within 60 feet, causing equipment and flesh to melt and partially fuse together. The creature must succeed at a DC 23 Reflex save or be [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for 1 minute.

</column>
name: Spawn Of Kothogaz

text: Spawn Of Kothogaz Kothogaz's presence causes the land to sprout festering hives. Insectile, acid-drooling spawn slither from these growths as lesser versions of their creator. Recall Knowledge - Beast (Arcana, Nature): DC 27 Unspecific Lore : DC 25 Specific Lore : DC 22 Spawn Of Kothogaz Source Monsters of Myth pg. 53 Perception +14 Languages Skills Acrobatics +15, Athletics +14, Stealth +13 Str +4 Dex +5 Con +3 Int -4 Wis +2 Cha +0 --- AC 24 Fort +13 Ref +17 Will +10 HP 70 , regeneration 10 (deactivated by good) Immunities acid --- Speed 40 feet, burrow 25 feet Melee Single Action mandibles +17 (Finesse, versatile S), Damage 2d10+7 piercing Melee Single Action wing shard +17 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 1d6+7 piercing plus 1d6 sonic Ranged Single Action putrid spit +17 (range increment 60 feet), Damage 2d8+4 acid Fusing Spit Two Actions (Acid) The spawn retches up thick, caustic sludge and spits it at a creature within 60 feet, causing equipment and flesh to melt and partially fuse together. The creature must succeed at a DC 23 Reflex save or be clumsy 2 for 1 minute.
